name: The Treasure Hunters
description:
You have landed on a mysterious island , you have heard rumors that this place is containing some booty and treasures galore! You see the Crusty Crew, your rivals.  You know they are here for the rumored treasures, and you are determined to get them first. Will you take the treasure and reign supreme over them or will you die a horrible death? 

This is a game I'm working on.  It only has 1 level but I assure you more levels are coming soon. I started making this game when pixel frog (link here: https://pixelfrog-store.itch.io/) made the treasure hunters asset pack free. I really wanted to try it out by making a game.

any feedback is welcome.
